description: Try our easy to follow Pulled Pork recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pulled Pork Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.60 cup dark brown sugar (save 1/4 cup dark brown sugar for vinegar sauce)
375ml beer (such as amber ale or pilsner)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Combine sugar, paprika, salt, mustard powder, celery salt and pepper in a bowl. Place pork on a large chopping board. Remove and discard netting. Using a sharp knife to remove skin and set aside. Place pork in a roasting pan. Sprinkle with sugar mixture, rub it into the pork. Add beer to base of pan and cover tightly with foil. Cook in oven for 33.5 hours or until pork is very tender.

Meanwhile, combine ingredients for sauce in a small saucepan over medium heat. Stir until sugar has dissolved and mixture comes to the boil. Simmer for 15 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly and is reduced by a third. Cool.

HowToTip.tipText: Cut pork rind into 1cm-wide strips, toss with 1 tbs of olive oil and season with sea salt flakes. Place on a deep baking tray lined with baking paper. Cook on top oven shelf, draining fat regularly.

recipeInstructions.text: Using 2 forks, shred pork evenly and place on a platter. Serve with the sauce and coleslaw.
